data.value: The closed beta test has ended.
Now preparing for the official release.

<align="left">This is a message from the 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS management team.

We are currently in preparation for the closed beta test, and we thank you for your patience.

- FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS Development Team</align>

<align="left">This is a message from the 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS management team.

We would like to thank you for your participation in the closed beta test
and ask that you share your feedback in our questionnaire!

We hope you continue to enjoy FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS!</align>

This is a message from the 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS management team.

We are currently preparing for the official game release. Service is planned to start Sep. 7 PDT. Please wait just a little longer, and we thank you for your patience.

This is a message from the 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS management team.

The game is currently under emergency maintenance. 
Due to this maintenance, the game will be temporarily unavailable. 
Please check the in-game notice for details.

This is a message from the 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS management team.

The game is currently undergoing maintenance.
 Please check the in-game notice or official social media accounts for more information.
 For the time being, please wait until maintenance is complete.

This is a message from the 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS management team.

The game is currently undergoing scheduled maintenance, as previously announced.
 Please check the in-game notice or official social media accounts for more information.
 For the time being, please wait until maintenance is complete.
